footer.about: Carpentry excellence for your interior. Design, security, and custom-made solutions.

product.defaultDescription: An exceptional door combining maximum security and contemporary design. Custom finishes available upon request.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have a question about our armored doors or exclusive Italian models? Our expert team is at your disposal.

form.title: Send us a message
form.name: Full Name
form.messagePlaceholder: Describe your needs (door type, dimensions, style...)

productDescriptions.Modello Roma: Timeless design inspired by the Colosseum. Aged brass finish for a noble and historic look. Ideal for classic interiors.
productDescriptions.Modello Venezia: Flowing lines reminiscent of Venetian canals. Shiny chrome for a touch of brilliance and luxury in a modern space.
productDescriptions.Modello Firenze: Renaissance art within reach. Sculpted bronze finish, offering perfect ergonomics and an artistic style.
productDescriptions.Modello Verona: Romantic and robust. Matte black zinc alloy, perfect for contrasting with light doors. Discreet charm.
productDescriptions.Modello Siena: Sienna earth and warm colors. Brushed copper finish, bringing unique warmth to your decoration.
productDescriptions.Modello Pisa: Architectural audacity. Slightly inclined design for an original and comfortable grip. Satin nickel finish.
productDescriptions.Modello Lucca: Protected and solid. Massive and reassuring design, brushed steel finish for fail-safe durability.
productDescriptions.Modello San Gimignano: The height of style. Long and thin handle, ideal for tall modern doors. Titanium finish.
productDescriptions.Modello Positano: The softness of the Amalfi coast. Rounded shapes and white ceramic finish for a Mediterranean touch.
productDescriptions.Modello Amalfi: Coastal luxury. Discreet inlays and pale gold finish. Perfect for a bright and sophisticated entrance.
productDescriptions.Modello Sorrento: Lemon and sun. Bright golden brass finish, to illuminate a dark door with striking contrast.
productDescriptions.Modello Capri: Island elegance. Ultra-thin minimalist design, mirror chrome finish. Absolute purity.
productDescriptions.Modello Portofino: Exclusive chic. Stitched leather on metal finish, for a luxurious feel and incomparable aesthetic.
productDescriptions.Modello Bellagio: The pearl of the lake. Fluid aquatic lines, polished black nickel finish. A jewel for your door.
productDescriptions.Modello Como: Serenity and depth. Rigorous square design, textured anthracite gray finish. For contemporary interiors.
productDescriptions.Porte Milano: The vanguard of design. Armored door with black tempered glass exterior panel and steel inserts. A2P BP3 security.
productDescriptions.Porte Torino: Industrial and chic. Polished concrete look finish with metallic details. 45dB sound insulation for absolute quiet.
productDescriptions.Porte Bologna: Learned tradition. Solid stained oak wood, deep moldings. 7-point lock for reinforced traditional security.
productDescriptions.Porte Genova: Opening to the world. Door with secured porthole and marine wrought iron grille. Ideal for seaside homes.
productDescriptions.Porte Napoli: Vibrant and solid. Deep red lacquered panel, structure reinforced against violent break-ins. An assertive character.
productDescriptions.Porte Palermo: Solar and rich. Light wood finish with fine marquetry. An entrance door that tells a story. A+ thermal insulation.
productDescriptions.Porte Bari: Simplicty of Puglia. Pure matte white, engraved horizontal lines. Perfect for modern minimalist architectures.
productDescriptions.Porte Catania: The strength of the volcano. Dark lava stone finish (composite). Extreme resistance to weather and impacts.
productDescriptions.Porte Trieste: Crossroads of cultures. Revisited Austro-Hungarian design, dark wood and brass finish. Diplomatic elegance.
productDescriptions.Porte Padova: Structural intelligence. Steel core, maintenance-free composite wood cladding. Technology at the service of daily life.
productDescriptions.Porte Parma: Classic refinement. Soft cream color, centered handle. Discreet elegance for beautiful mansions.
productDescriptions.Porte Modena: Speed and line. Inspired by supercars, red lacquer or carbon black finish. Concealed hinges and biometric lock.
productDescriptions.Porte Brescia: Pure steel. Fully metallic door with raw varnished finish. For lofts and industrial spaces.
productDescriptions.Porte Perugia: Green heart. Eco-designed door with certified wood and natural cork insulation. High thermal performance.
productDescriptions.Porte Livorno: Port-like and robust. Epoxy paint resistant to salt and humidity. The ideal door for exposed areas.
